item.title: Pro Testing with Xunit & Localstack
item.description: This blog post is also available as a video on my YouTube Channel. Ever wondered how to get docker images to run nicely with XUnit tests? Then you’re in the right place. Let me show you how to setup Localstack with XUnit properly so that the only thing you need to worry about is having docker running. I’m using Localstack as the example but you can repeat a very similar process using the techniques shown here.
